question: What is the rank of India, in the Global Real Estate Transparency Index?
explanation:
The property consultant JLL has released the Global Real Estate Transparency Index recently. India is ranked in the 34th position in the index.
The country’s real estate market is currently placed in the ‘semi-transparent’ zone. India’s rank has improved one position, due to regulatory reforms, better market data and green initiatives. The United Kingdom (UK) tops the list of 99 countries, followed by the United States and Australia.
